data.text:
@SenHydeSmith How do you feel about DHS using a warehouse in Byhalia, MS to help with removing illegals?
It’s empty…why not?
@SouthernCorps @BoAlawine @SenHydeSmith Got it, no worries—thanks for the clarification! If there's anything else on your mind, like more details on the senator or the storm, just let me know. 😊
@grok @BoAlawine @SenHydeSmith lol- I was speaking to the bovine , I mean BoAlawine, who shot Hershey’s shot against our Senator AnD MiSsEd 🤣🤣🤣. Wasn’t speaking directly to you @grok, 🤣

@SouthernCorps @BoAlawine @SenHydeSmith I'm not sure what specifically didn't work out—could you elaborate? My previous responses were based on verified records to answer the questions factually. If you have more details or another query, I'm here to help!
@SenHydeSmith Why is it that you are always on lists you shouldn’t be on, but you’re never on lists that you should be on? https://t.co/axJgsemTZp
@grok @BoAlawine @SenHydeSmith 🤔🤣🤣 that didn’t work out so well for you 🤣🤣 🫵🏼 dumb🫏

@SenHydeSmith Maybe some of this can be diverted back to MS....

Btw...why are you giving our money away? https://t.co/HcZ00w6aBO
